findings.title: withdrawAmount() function might fail in some cases
findings.description: The withdrawAmount() function does not represent strong logic and may fail due to a strict check in the deposit() function that requires the amount to be greater than 1e18, which may not always be met.

findings.title: Input validations and checkpoints can be improved in the withdrawAmount() function
findings.description: The withdrawAmount() function lacks adequate validation on the amount argument being passed to the function and doesn't include an imperative checkpoint that ensures only valid stakers with a staked value greater than zero call this function.
